image:image.image:title: AI Hype vs Adoption
image:image.image:caption: Everything around AI is overhyped for retention. But how much is actually getting adopted into daily workflows?

image:image.image:title: The Art vs Craft of Building with Code
image:image.image:caption: Tools make implementation easier, but they don't solve the harder problem of designing systems that actually work.

image:image.image:title: Publishing Without the WordPress Headache
image:image.image:caption: I keep coming back to a simple question: can I get my ideas onto my website without the WordPress circus?

image:image.image:title: The Human Edge
image:image.image:caption: Why human context windows still matter, even as AI gets faster and cheaper with smaller prompts.

image:image.image:title: Skills in L&D
image:image.image:caption: We're attracted to skills systems without understanding maintenance. The focus should be embedding skills in AI systems first.
